'''{{Pagename nd}}''' is a {{lc:Quest item}} in {{poe2}}.

##  Description 

{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

##  Acquisition 

{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

## Usage

* This can be returned to [Rinco](/rinco/) as you promised, or you can take the money yourself via the "Take Money" button in the examine menu. This will give you {{cp2|2000}}, [Rinco's Earring](/rincosEarring/) (worth {{cp2|300}}), and an [empty purse](/rincosEmptyCoinPurse/). Note that you can still return the money to Rinco after opening the purse.

## Trivia

* It is possible to earn two pouches by convincing [Mokeha](/mokeha/) to give you the pouch peacefully, then pickpocketing or killing her afterwards. You are able to keep one and return one to Rinco. Note that taking the money from a stacked pair of purses will only yield the contents of one, and will destroy both - so you need to open one of the pouches before obtaining the other.
*This bug was fixed!

== Description ==
{{Description |{{#var:description}}}}

== Acquisition ==
{{#arraymap: {{#var:location}}|;|x|x|\n}}

==Usage==
* This can be returned to [[Rinco]] as you promised, or you can take the money yourself via the "Take Money" button in the examine menu. This will give you {{cp2|2000}}, [[Rinco's Earring]] (worth {{cp2|300}}), and an [[Rinco's Empty Coin Purse|empty purse]]. Note that you can still return the money to Rinco after opening the purse.

==Trivia==
* It is possible to earn two pouches by convincing [[Mokeha]] to give you the pouch peacefully, then pickpocketing or killing her afterwards. You are able to keep one and return one to Rinco. Note that taking the money from a stacked pair of purses will only yield the contents of one, and will destroy both - so you need to open one of the pouches before obtaining the other.
*This bug was fixed!
